title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: A skeleton lies spread eagle on the dark hill side.  Manacles secure the remains at the wrist and ankles.  A strong night wind occasionally makes the skeleton rattle.  The skeleton is intact except for the skull which is now nothing more than small chips and powdered bone.
